answers.answer: I would like a glucose tracker that works with or has components for food intake and insulin dosage
I have recently been diagnosed with diabetes. any information available would be wonderful to receive! Thanks, ***@****
i am interested in diabetes tracker .allways interested in learning about diabetes, even if i have read it befor its a refresher course

I was diagnosed with diabeties over four years ago.  I am currently on meds and inject insulin.  The best thing you can do is READ LABELS.  By knowing the amount of carbohydrates in the foods you are eating, it will help you.  If you are able to use the services of a nutriotinst, they are great help to educate you.  Certain foods breakdown quicker than other ( for example whole wheat bread quicker than white bread).Please let me know if anyone has any specific questions.THANKS.. you can email directly at ***@****
My husband has diabetes and is about to go on to insulin.I  would be interested in anything that could help me help him

Hi there, do you know what type of insulin your husband will be going on?  It is very important that he understands how the insulin works with food.  Another words, there is usually a ratio of insulin to carbohydrates that he will be given.  It does take ahwile to learn how to regulate your insulin.  Make sure that he tests often until he educates himself. Also,  if he does inject too much insulin, his levels will be too low.  Make sure that he always has glucose tablets with him in case this happens.Keep me updated and let me know specific question you would like answered.

Hi,We just released a new Diabetes tracker today. You can get it in the Diabetes community at:http://www.medhelp.org/forums/show/46. We're going to be adding to this over the next few weeks, so please let us know your feedback. Thanks!MedHelp

question: We've had many requests for a diabetes or glucose level tracker. This feature will be launching in the near future. If you're interested in a diabetes tracker, leave us a comment below and we'll let you know when it's available.Thanks,MedHelp
title: Diabetes Tracker
